ackComment.description: The comment associated with the Collector acknowledgement (if it is in alert and acknowledged)

acked.description: Whether or not the Collector is currently acknowledged

ackedBy.description: The user that acknowledged the Collector (if it is in alert)

ackedOn.description: The epoch at which the Collector was acknowledged (if it is in alert)

ackedOnLocal.description: The time that the Collector was acknowledged (if it is in alert), in local time format

arch.description: The collector architecture (Windows | Linux platform followed by 32 | 64 bit)

automaticUpgradeInfo.description: The details of the Collector's automatic upgrade schedule, if one exists

backupAgentId.description: The Id of the backup Collector assigned to the Collector

canDowngrade.description: Whether the collector can be downgraded to a lower version

canDowngradeReason.description: The reason why the collector can be downgraded

clearSent.description: Whether or not an alert clear notifcation has been sent for this Collector

collectorDeviceId.description: The device id of the collector device

collectorGroupId.description: The Id of the group the Collector is in

collectorGroupName.description: The name of the group the Collector is in

company.description: The user's company (portal) name, this field is required if the environment variable LM_COMPANY is not set

confVersion.description: The version of the agent.conf configuration file

createdOn.description: The time that the Collector was created, in epoch format

createdOnLocal.description: The time that the Collector was created, in local time format

customProperties.description: The custom properties defined for the Collector

ea.description: Whether the collector is in EA version

enableFailBack.description: Whether or not automatic failback is enabled for the Collector, the default value is true

enableFailOverOnCollectorDevice.description: Whether or not the device the Collector is installed on is enabled for fail over

escalatingChainId.description: The Id of the escalation chain associated with this Collector

hasFailOverDevice.description: Whether the collector has failover devices

hostname.description: The hostname of the device the Collector is installed on

inSDT.description: The SDT status of the collector

installer_url_cmds.description: A map of the collector urls and (if linux) commands to download the collector installer

isDown.description: Whether or not the Collector is currently down

lastSentNotificationOn.description: The time, in epoch format, that a notification was last sent for the Collector

lastSentNotificationOnLocal.description: The time that a notification was last sent for this Collector, in local time format

monitorOthers.description: Check if we shall monitor using local account (for windows)

needAutoCreateCollectorDevice.description: Whether to create a collector device when instance collector, the default value is true

netscanVersion.description: The Netscan version associated with the Collector

nextRecipient.description: The Id of the next recipient to which alert notifications will be sent

nextUpgradeInfo.description: The details of the Collector's next upgrade, if one has been scheduled

numberOfHosts.description: The number of devices monitored by the Collector

numberOfInstances.description: The number of instances that are monitored by this collector

numberOfWebsites.description: The number of websites monitored by the Collector

onetimeDowngradeInfo.description: The details of the Collector's automatic downgrade schedule, if one exists

onetimeUpgradeInfo.description: The details of the Collector's one time upgrade, if one has been scheduled

platform.description: The OS of the Collector device (e.g. Linux, Windows)

previousVersion.description: The previous version of the collector, used for downgrading

resendIval.description: The interval, in minutes, after which alert notifications for the Collector will be resent

specifiedCollectorDeviceGroupId.description: The collector device group id assigned when creating a new collector device

status.description: The registration status of the Collector. Acceptable values are: 0= unregistered, 1= registered, 2= stopped, 3= suspended

suppressAlertClear.description: Whether alert clear notifications are suppressed for the Collector

updatedOn.description: The time that the Collector was last updated, in epoch format

updatedOnLocal.description: The time that the Collector was last updated, in local time format

upTime.description: The time the Collector has been up, in seconds

userChangeOn.description: The last time the Collector was updated, in epoch format

userChangeOnLocal.description: The last time the Collector was updated, in the account time zone

userPermission.description: The permission level of the user that made the API request to get Collector information

userVisibleHostsNum.description: The number of devices monitored by the Collector and visible to the user that made the query

userVisibleWebsitesNum.description: The number of websites monitored by the Collector and visible to the user that made the query

watchdogUpdatedOn.description: The time that the Watchdog Services was last updated, in epoch format

watchdogUpdatedOnLocal.description: The time that the Collector Watchdog was last updated, in local time format

websiteConf.description: Whether or not the device the Collector is installed on is enabled for fail over

autoBalance.description: Denotes whether or not the collector group should be auto balanced

autoBalanceInstanceCountThreshold.description: Threshold for instance count strategy to check if a collector has high load

createOn.description: The time at which the group was created, in epoch format

customProperties.description: The custom properties defined for the Collector group

description.description: The description of the Collector Group
description.example: Group for collectors dedicated to Network Devices

id.description: The id of the Collector Group

name.description: The name of the Collector Group

numOfCollectors.description: The number of Collectors that belong to the group

userPermission.description: The permission level of the user that made the API request

info.description: LogicMonitor is a SaaS-based performance monitoring platform that provides full visibility into complex, hybrid infrastructures, offering granular performance monitoring and actionable data and insights. logicmonitor_sdk enables you to manage your LogicMonitor account programmatically.
info.title: LogicMonitor REST API
